arts.ttl: Giant-killer Pontevedra slays Mallorca in second consecutive big Copa del Rey win
arts.sum: Dalisson de Almeida scored from almost 40 yards to make it 1-0 after 21 minutes, Yelko Pino doubled the lead with a cracking volley four minutes into the second half, and then Rufo rounded off the perfect night with 18 minutes left after a shocking defensive lapse. Rayo Vallecano made swift work of second-tier Racing Ferrol.
